wepppy.all_your_base.get_utm_zone(srs)¶

extracts the utm_zone from an osr.SpatialReference object (srs)

returns the utm_zone as an int, returns None if utm_zone not found

wepppy.all_your_base.haversine(point1, point2, miles=False)¶

Calculate the great-circle distance between two points on the Earth surface. :input: two 2-tuples, containing the longitude and latitude of each point in decimal degrees. :output: Returns the distance between the two points. The default unit is kilometers. Miles can be returned if the miles parameter is set to True.
